content.raw:
I don't fully understand how the inline namespaces work; my question was just based on pattern-matching. We modified Utility.hh and Utility.cc, but only Factory.hh. I'll take people's word that we don't need to touch Factory.cc, but I don't feel comfortable approving this if I don't understand it.

You can merge without my approval though.
